system.requirements: Tier 2: Psy Rating, Psyniscience +10, 10+ Corruption. Aptitudes: Knowledge, Psyker
system.effect: When making a Focus Power Test, the character can choose to gain Corruption Points up to their Psy Rating, for each point gained this way, they gain +10 to their Focus Power Test, but +5 to Psychic Phenomena.

description.value: When making a Focus Power Test, the character can choose to gain Corruption Points up to their Psy Rating, for each point gained this way, they gain +10 to their Focus Power Test, but +5 to Psychic Phenomena.
